full_summary:
# E6MON-230007 - RMSO - PERIOD 2 - Wood and Construction Materials

## Mandatory Information

- **Contract Reference**: WS3851353187-Doc4064888410
- **Amendment Number**: 1
- **Public Tender Notice**: E6MON-230007 OCPR - PÉRIODE 2 - Bois et matériaux de construction
- **Publication Date**: June 21, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date and Time**: July 12, 2023 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time
- **Amendment Date**: July 7, 2023

## Procurement Details

- **Supply Category**: Wood and Construction Materials
- **UN/SPSC Codes**: 30000000 - Structures and Building and Construction and Manufacturing Components and Supplies
  * 30110000 - Concrete and cement and plaster
  * 30130000 - Structural building products
  * 30170000 - Doors and windows and glass
  * 30260000 - Structural materials
- **Regions of Opportunity**: Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region)
- **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region)

## Trade Agreements

- **Trade Agreements**: The following trade agreements apply:
  * Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  * Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
  * Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
  * Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  * Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
  * Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  * Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
  * Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
  * World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
  * Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
  * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  * Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

## Tender and Contract Details

- **Contract Type**: Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Traditional
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
- **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024
- **Tender Status**: Expiration date passed

## Contact Information

- **Contact Name**: Corine Lavoie
- **Contact Email**: corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc
